TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit TrackingCondition extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Una classe di base che rappresenta un confronto che può essere utilizzato per vincolare una o una .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> è la classe base astratta da cui <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> derivato.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> viene valutato confrontando il valore di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> applicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, inizializza una nuova istanza della classe .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Member { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property Member As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Member { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Quando si esegue l'override in una classe derivata, ottiene o imposta il nome del membro il cui valore deve essere confrontato.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il valore di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> verrà confrontato con <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> applicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride Property Operator As ComparisonOperator

public: abstract property System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::ComparisonOperator Operator { System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::ComparisonOperator get(); void set(System::Workflow::Runtime::Tracking::ComparisonOperator value); };

Docs.summary: Quando si esegue l'override in una classe derivata, ottiene o imposta l'operatore da utilizzare nel confronto.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Attualmente sono supportati solo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator.Equals> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator.NotEquals>.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Value { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property Value As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Quando è sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, consente di ottenere o impostare il valore da confrontare.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> verrà confrontato con il valore di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> applicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
